text: Aur Insano hi mein se koi aisa bhi hai jo kalaam-e-dil fareb [lagv baaton ko/idle talks (i.e.music, singing, etc)] khareed kar laata hai taa-ke logon ko Allah ke raaste se ilm ke bagair bhatka dey aur is raaste ki dawat ko mazaaq mein udaday. Aise logon ke liye sakht zaleel karne wala azaab hai
